title: Microsoft Teams news for January 2022 include music mode, front row on Windows, and more
content:
We’re already in February, and in typical Microsoft fashion, the company has let us know all the new features that rolled out to Teams users during the month of January. As per usual, the list of changes and news is massive, so there’s a lot to go through, but it’s not as big as some

The post Microsoft Teams news for January 2022 include music mode, front row on Windows, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has rounded up all the new features added to Teams in January 2022, including high-fidelity audio, front row, and more.
